statements: SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, location FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, installation_date FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name = 'Picasso';
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS sculptures_count FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, artist_name, location, installation_date FROM sculptures ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, location FROM sculptures WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_name, location, artist_name FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo Da Vinci';
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM sculptures WHERE installation_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, location FROM sculptures WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, materials FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, location_name FROM sculptures WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_name, materials FROM sculptures ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM logistics WHERE transportation_method = 'Truck' AND installation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, installation_date FROM sculptures WHERE location_name = 'Central Park';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, installation_date FROM sculptures WHERE materials = 'Bronze';
SELECT * FROM sculptures ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, materials FROM sculptures WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_name, location_name, installation_team FROM sculptures s JOIN logistics l ON s.sculpture_id = l.sculpture_id WHERE l.transportation_method = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM Sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material FROM Sculptures WHERE height > 5;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, weight FROM Sculptures WHERE material = 'bronze';
SELECT * FROM InstallationLogistics ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, installation_date, installation_location FROM InstallationLogistics WHERE cost > 5000;
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, artist_name FROM Sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_id, material, height, width, weight FROM Sculptures WHERE material = 'marble';
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name, COUNT(*) FROM Sculptures GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT installation_location, installation_date, cost FROM InstallationLogistics ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, transportation_method, destination FROM Sculptures JOIN Transportation ON Sculptures.sculpture_id = Transportation.sculpture_id;
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material FROM sculptures WHERE height > 10;
SELECT installation_name, location, installation_date FROM installations WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT sculpture_name, height, width, weight FROM sculptures ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM logistics WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material FROM sculptures WHERE height > 10 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT installation_name, location, installation_date, start_time, end_time FROM installations WHERE location = 'Museum' AND start_time > '12:00' ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT id, transportation_mode, departure_date, arrival_date, cost FROM transportation WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM logistics WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Sculpture;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM Sculpture WHERE installation_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM InstallationSite WHERE site_accessible = true;
SELECT site_name, location FROM InstallationSite WHERE site_size = 'medium';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, installation_date FROM Sculpture ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material FROM Sculpture
SELECT sculpture_name, installation_date, material FROM Sculpture ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM InstallationSite WHERE site_accessible = TRUE
SELECT site_name, location FROM InstallationSite WHERE site_size = 'Medium'

SELECT t.company_name, tl.installation_date, i.site_name FROM TransportationCompany t INNER JOIN TransportManifest tm ON t.company_id = tm.transport_company_id INNER JOIN InstallationLog tl ON tm.sculpture_id = tl.sculpture_id INNER JOIN InstallationSite i ON tl.site_id = i.site_id ORDER BY tl.installation_date
